  • Constructor Details

    • Sale

      public Sale(int staffID, String date, Customer customer, String localCurrency, ArrayList<Blank> blanks, String paymentType)
      Initializes a new Sale object with the provided staffID, date, customer, local currency, list of blanks, and payment type.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the ID of the staff member who made the sale
      date - the date the sale was made
      customer - the customer who made the purchase
      localCurrency - the currency used in the sale
      blanks - an ArrayList of Blank objects representing the items sold in the sale
      paymentType - the type of payment used in the sale

  • Method Details

    • setSaleID

      public void setSaleID(int saleID)

    • getSaleID

      public int getSaleID()

    • uploadToDatabase

      public void uploadToDatabase()

    • calcSum

      public double calcSum(ArrayList<Blank> blanks)
      Calculates the total sum of prices in GBP for a given ArrayList of Blank objects.
      Parameters:
      blanks - An ArrayList of Blank objects for which the total price in GBP is to be calculated.
      Returns:
      The sum of prices in GBP for the given ArrayList of Blank objects.

    • takeDiscountOff

      public void takeDiscountOff(ArrayList<Blank> blanks, Customer customer)
      Applies the discount obtained from the Customer object to the price of the given list of Blanks.
      Parameters:
      blanks - the list of Blanks to apply the discount to
      customer - the Customer object containing the discount information

    • calcCommissionSum

      public double calcCommissionSum(ArrayList<Blank> blanks)
      Calculates the total commission sum for a list of blanks.
      Parameters:
      blanks - the list of blanks to calculate commission for
      Returns:
      the total commission sum for the given list of blanks

    • printSale

      public void printSale()

    • pushToDatabase

      public void pushToDatabase() throws SQLException
      This method pushes the current sale object to the database by inserting its values into the "sale" table in the database. It uses a prepared statement to and sets the values of the parameters in the statement based on the attributes of the current sale object.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs or this method is called on a closed connection.

    • pushSaleToSoldBlanks

      public void pushSaleToSoldBlanks(String description)
      Inserts sale information into the soldBlanks table in the database, including the sale ID, blank ID, and date used. If the blank ID is greater than 450,which means it is an MCO blank it inserts the description of the blank as well.
      Parameters:
      description - a String for the MCO blank description, otherwise null

    • selectMaxSaleID

      public int selectMaxSaleID()
      Selects the maximum sale ID from the sale table in the database.
      Returns:
      the maximum sale ID as an integer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error in the SQL query.

    • printBlanks

      public String printBlanks()
